overview:
Syncrosome is a Non-Clinical Drug Evaluation Company that performs pharmacological studies in the Preclinical phase since 11 years.

As a lot of studies shows that the high cost of Drug Discovery and Drug development is directly related to late failure, we are mainly focused on providing you with early relevant in vivo information on your leads.

Our team, and professional study directors, is able to help you, meeting your deadlines, in selecting your highest performing drug candidates. You will have information about the benefit/risk ratio of your compounds, before deciding wich one will go further.

Our expertise is focused on these three areas :

  • Efficacy (CNS, Cardiovascular, Gastrointestinal, Respiratory, and other suitable models ).
  • Pharmacokinetics (and CNS PK)
  • Early safety studies (spÃ©cial package)

We are proud to be part of the preclinical strategy of numerous partners from big pharma’s to Small drug discovery companies, including middle sized organizations.
